original_title: Boogie Beebies - Your Chance to Dance!
overview: Get ready to boogie with the first ever Boogie Beebies DVD! Featuring seven different dances - one for every day of the week: "Dig It", "Ocean Motion", "Go Go Mango", "Space Walking", "Turning Around", "Gardening" and "Hey Monkey".
title: Boogie Beebies - Your Chance to Dance!
